item.title: The Weekly Hobo 9/19
item.description: Let the Floodgates Open And let the trades rush forth. Early in the morning, in the dead dark of night, team Macho Mel swindled LeGarrette Cunt into giving away their best player for a pair of scrubs. Our insider sources have confirmed that Leonard Fournette and Julio Jones are now Melians, while the Browns (AJ and Marquise) have been sentenced to serve on LeGarrette Cunt. This is very questionable trade for LeGarrette Cunt.

item.title: Hobo Draft Guide: QB
item.description: A Brief Introduction Welcome to the new and improved Hobo News Network, your #1 source of unbiased Ray Riceâ€™s Left Hook news! Check in throughout the season for draft guides, trade reviews, game previews, and much more. The 2020-2021 RRLH draft is tentatively scheduled for Sunday September 6 (according to Commissioner Jose). Over the next couple days we will be publishing guides for each position, to ensure you are adequately prepared and ready to dominate.
